PHRASE.LANG: Ethnic clothing that has been dyed a brilliant purple and delicately embroidered with traditional patterns.\nThe light cape draped over the shoulders and yellow flower corsage wrapped around the waist add the finishing touches to this cute design. [#Legal]

Cette tenue ethnique teinte en violet vif arbore des motifs traditionnels délicatement brodés.\nLa cape légère qu'on enroule autour des épaules et le bouquet de fleurs jaune ceignant la taille mettent la touche finale à cette jolie tenue. [#Legal]

Das Trachtengewand in leuchtendem Lila ist mit landestypischen zierlichen Mustern bestickt.\nDer leichte Schulterumhang und die gelbe Blumencorsage, die um die Taille geschnürt wird, ergänzen dieses hübsche Ensemble. [#Legal]

Vestiti etnici tinti con un pigmento viola brillante e ricamati con motivi tradizionali.\nLa mantellina coprispalle e i decori floreali gialli attorno alla vita sono i tocchi finali di questo grazioso completo. [#Legal]

El atuendo étnico está teñido en vivos tonos morados y delicadamente bordado con motivos tradicionales.\nLa ligera capa que cubre los hombros y el cinturón de flor amarilla ponen los toques finales a este bonito diseño. [#Legal]

Ethnic clothing that has been dyed a brilliant purple and delicately embroidered with traditional patterns.\nThe light cape draped over the shoulders and yellow flower corsage wrapped around the waist add the finishing touches to this cute design. [#Legal]
